title: Virtual Reality Simulation-Based Nursing Education Curriculum Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Nursing Principles and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Simulation-based training utilizing virtual reality (VR) technology for office/administrative professionals. Project-based learning and assessment implemented using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can perform patient status assessment and nursing intervention procedures with 80% accuracy in VR simulation environments
Learners can develop and implement nursing team collaboration strategies through scenario-based PBL activities
Learners can establish self-reflection and improvement plans through debriefing sessions after VR simulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
